title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 190.7 - Supervision of employees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 190.7 - Supervision of employees

State Regulations

Each apartment information vendor shall supervise his
employees to insure their compliance with all requirements of the provisions
relating to apartment information vendors in article 12-C of the Real Propery

Law and this Part. Any violation of the law or regulations by an employee shall
be attributable to the vendor, and the vendor shall be held responsible for
such violations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
190.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
